backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing stories, users, and profiles with access control, user creation, retrieval, and profile management.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping PWA and installability features to their related files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON mapping listing short summaries for many frontend source files used in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with PWA meta tags, manifest link, icons, and mobile-optimized settings.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest specifying app metadata, theme colors, icons, and display mode.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker handling install, activate, and fetch events with offline-first caching and static asset support.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring routes, splash screen, PWA service worker registration, and global providers.
frontend/src/components/AdPlaceholder.ts: Simple placeholder component rendering banner and inline ad mockups while ignoring interstitial or rewarded types.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Renders a fixed bottom navigation bar with localized tab labels and active route highlighting.
frontend/src/components/CategoryScroller: Displays a horizontally scrollable list of categories filtered by mode and navigates to category pages.
frontend/src/components/ContinueReadingC: Shows the user's last-read story with cover, progress bar, and navigation to resume reading.
frontend/src/components/InstallPromptBan: Displays a PWA install banner with install and dismiss actions when the app is installable.
frontend/src/components/InterstitialAdMo: Modal showing an interstitial ad placeholder with a countdown before allowing dismissal.
frontend/src/components/LanguageSelector: Dropdown selector for choosing the app's language from supported options.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Button that handles Internet Identity login/logout and updates query state accordingly.
frontend/src/components/ModeToggle.tsx: Toggle buttons to switch between adults and kids reading modes.
Popover with controls for font size, reading background, and auto-scroll settings.
frontend/src/components/ReminderBanner.t: Shows a dismissible reminder banner based on reminder logic.
frontend/src/components/ShareSheetPlaceh: Provides share functionality using Web Share API or clipboard with engagement tracking.
frontend/src/components/SplashScreen.tsx: Full-screen splash screen with random quote and app logo.
frontend/src/components/StoryCard.tsx: Card for displaying story details, supporting featured and standard layouts with navigation.
Banner offering a placeholder translation option and showing a notice after translation.
Provides UI preference state (language, mode, font size, background, scroll, categories) synced with user accounts or local storage and auto-detects language.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, reinitializes on identity changes, and invalidates dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppUser.ts: Manages unified user state for authenticated and guest users, syncing with backend or localStorage and exposing update helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useFavorites.ts: Handles favorite stories for authenticated and guest users, syncing with backend or localStorage and offering toggle helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Wraps Internet Identity auth client, exposing identity, login/logout actions, and login status via context.
frontend/src/hooks/useOfflineDownloads.t: Stores and retrieves offline story data in localStorage, supporting download, removal, and lookup operations.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstallPrompt.t: Handles PWA install prompt behavior, tracking dismissals and exposing functions to show or hide the prompt.
frontend/src/hooks/useReadingHistory.ts: Tracks reading history for users or guests, storing entries in backend or localStorage and providing progress helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useStories.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch story lists, single stories, and the daily featured story using the actor API with filters.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, CSS variables for theming, and font classes for multilingual support.
frontend/src/lib/covers.ts: Returns appropriate cover image URLs based on story category and kid‑friendly mode.
frontend/src/lib/engagement.ts: Manages user engagement data in localStorage including streaks, shares, badges, and progress updates.
frontend/src/lib/fonts.ts: Maps UI languages to corresponding font CSS classes.
frontend/src/lib/i18n.ts: Defines supported UI languages and localized UI string dictionaries.
frontend/src/lib/kidsMode.ts: Provides helpers to determine kid‑safe categories and filter category lists for kids mode.
frontend/src/lib/reminders.ts: Handles reminder settings and timing logic using localStorage to decide when to show reminders.
frontend/src/lib/storyLanguage.ts: Maps UI languages to backend languages and selects appropriate story content or translation availability.
frontend/src/lib/translatePlaceholder.ts: Generates placeholder translated story content by modifying the English version with markers.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, setting up React Query and the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/CategoriesTab.tsx: Displays filtered categories with cover images and navigation to category detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryDetail.tsx: Shows stories in a selected category using filters and language preferences, with back navigation and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/FavoritesTab.tsx: Renders the user's favorite stories or an empty‑state message with guidance.
frontend/src/pages/GoPremium.tsx: Premium purchase placeholder page with feature list and buttons to activate monthly or yearly plans.
frontend/src/pages/HomeTab.tsx: Home screen showing featured story, categories, latest stories, and ads unless user is premium.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileTab.tsx: Profile page displaying engagement stats, badges, account info, and link to premium upgrade.
frontend/src/pages/SearchTab.tsx: Search interface allowing text filtering and sorting of stories with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/StoryReader.tsx: Story reading view with translations, favorites, downloads, scroll progress, and reading controls.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers service worker on load and periodically checks for updates.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters for navigation state.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, custom OKLCH-based colors, extended animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing the PWA-style Global Tales Universe app, its features, architecture notes, image requirements, and existing implemented features.
